channel.title: [DELTA] Need Help With 3 Questions
channel.description:
Hello,
First: I wanne make like void defenders en fire cape and some more that when you die it will drop and like i die i will be able 2 pick it up and that after like 5min it will dissapear
Second: Is there a tut or something how to add Pest Control or can somewane help me adding pest control
Third: I wanne add an NPC Exchange shop cause i coded when you kill a npc you will recieve npc points and i wanne make a shop that where you can use your npc points like PkPoints ("Dont say edit PkPoints System cause i tried wont work -.- cause it are 2 diffrent systems")
That where my questions if you dont understand tell me i will try 2 explain more clear
Thanks for helping :D

Thanks
Can you or anyone ells help me with the other questions?

if (!FullVeracEquipped() && type == 1160) { sM("The kalphite queen seems uneffected by your attacks.."); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; }

Topic:

thanks

David:

M8 The Fuck You Talking About

item.title: [DELTA] Need Help With 3 Questions
item.dc:creator: @David_The_Drummer David The Drummer
item.description:
@David_The_Drummer wrote:

[quote=“Soul Eater, post:2, topic:374194”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=469942.msg3436001#msg3436001 date=1292771699]
Hello, for your drop party thing, look at this;

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

For the point shop, again, please search (It can be edited for your needs);

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


[/quote]

Thx for the thing about Dpartys

but about the second 1 how do you mean i have tried to edit that already wouldnt work :S

can you maybe help me with turmoil adding?? (if you know how :P)[/quote]
I know you have questions, but this isn’t a spoon feeding community. Try using that thing called a search bar up there, and if that doesn’t work, try ripping stuff like that from other sources, and if that doesn’t work, THEN come ask your questions. There is no point in us giving you step-by-step instructions, because the whole point of this is so you can learn HOW, not just ctrl+C, ctrl+V, and l33ch.

Read full topic
